Text: any chance of a daredevil collection. thanks

I don`t think so,most of the older Dredevil runs I have on 20+ discks so it would be real pain in 
the ass for me to upload it,maybe from 1998 when kevin smith and joe quesada started a run under the imprint of Marvel Knights,but I would have to divide it in few uploads `cause there`s so many of them.If there are more interested I would probably do it.The main job is to find the cd`s where are they...

Oh,by the way feel free to comment on this images and the whole ,,SHADOWLAND,, event and tell me if you want me to upload few remaining pictures of the ,,SHADOWLAND,, promo `cause I missed a few ones...
